questions.question: Write an email to the manager applying for a weekend receptionist job at a fitness centre.
keyPoints: Say where you saw the advert and why you are interested
Ask about working hours and interview availability

questions.question: Write an email to a language school asking for information about an intensive English course before you book.
keyPoints: Ask about dates, timetable and fees
Ask how to register and pay

questions.question: Write an email of complaint to the hotel manager about a stay that did not match the advertised standard.
keyPoints: Describe the main problems clearly and specifically
Explain how the problems affected your stay
Request compensation or a practical solution

questions.question: Write an email to the college principal explaining how reduced library opening hours affect students and suggesting a solution.
keyPoints: Explain how students are affected and why it matters
Justify why the solution would help

questions.question: Write an email to your supervisor comparing two training providers and recommending one option.
keyPoints: Compare price and course content briefly
Recommend one option and justify your choice
